name: index_at_scroll_region_bottom
description: IND (ESC D) at the bottom of a scroll region triggers scroll-up within the region
comment: Fill rows 0-2: AAAAA / BBBBB / CCCCC. Set scroll region 1;3 (rows 0-2). CUP to (2,0). IND scrolls region up: row 0=BBBBB, row 1=CCCCC, row 2=blank. Cursor stays at (2,0).
